title: Bug 5358Suspicious usage of IJavaElementDelta.getFlags()
OB: Build 20011025Searching for references to IJavaElement.getFlags(), I found suspicious usagein JDT UI code.There are pattern of code like this one:delta.getFlags() == IJavaElementDelta.FCONTENTwhere it should be:(delta.getFlags() & IJavaElementDelta.FCONTENT) != 0
